import React from 'react'; import './DivingPage.css'; const DivingPage = () => { const divingStats = { totalDives: "75+", certification: "PADI Divemaster", specializations: 5, countries: 8, deepestDive: "40m", favoriteType: "Wreck Diving" }; const specializations = [ { name: "Deep Diver", description: "Certified to dive up to 40 meters deep", icon: "üåä", achievements: ["Explored deep coral walls", "Night diving at 35m", "Deep wreck penetrations"] }, { name: "Wreck Diver", description: "Specialized in exploring sunken ships and artificial reefs", icon: "‚öì", achievements: ["Penetrated 15+ wrecks", "Advanced wreck navigation", "Underwater photography of wrecks"] }, { name: "Nitrox Diver", description: "Enriched air diving for extended bottom times", icon: "üí®", achievements: ["EANx32 and EANx36 certified", "Extended bottom times", "Safer decompression profiles"] }, { name: "Night Diver", description: "Exploring the underwater world after dark", icon: "üåô", achievements: ["20+ night dives", "Nocturnal marine life photography", "Night navigation skills"] }, { name: "Underwater Navigator", description: "Advanced compass and natural navigation techniques", icon: "üß≠", achievements: ["Complex navigation patterns", "Search and recovery", "Precision compass headings"] } ]; const diveLocations = [ { country: "Maldives", sites: ["Manta Point", "Banana Reef", "Shark Point"], highlights: ["Manta ray encounters", "Reef sharks", "Crystal clear waters"], coordinates: { lat: 3.2028, lng: 73.2207 }, dives: "15+" }, { country: "Thailand", sites: ["Koh Tao", "Similan Islands", "Richelieu Rock"], highlights: ["Whale shark sightings", "Colorful coral gardens", "Macro photography"], coordinates: { lat: 15.8700, lng: 100.9925 }, dives: "20+" }, { country: "Egypt", sites: ["Blue Hole", "Thistlegorm Wreck", "Ras Mohammed"], highlights: ["Historic WWII wreck", "Dramatic drop-offs", "Red Sea coral diversity"], coordinates: { lat: 27.2636, lng: 33.6118 }, dives: "12+" }, { country: "Australia", sites: ["Great Barrier Reef", "Cod Hole", "SS Yongala"], highlights: ["Potato cod interactions", "World heritage reef", "Pristine wreck ecosystem"], coordinates: { lat: -16.2839, lng: 145.7781 }, dives: "8+" }, { country: "Philippines", sites: ["Apo Island", "Donsol", "Palawan"], highlights: ["Whale shark diving", "Pristine reefs", "Underwater caves"], coordinates: { lat: 12.8797, lng: 121.7740 }, dives: "10+" }, { country: "Indonesia", sites: ["Komodo", "Raja Ampat", "Bunaken"], highlights: ["Manta cleaning stations", "Biodiversity hotspot", "Drift diving"], coordinates: { lat: -0.7893, lng: 113.9213 }, dives: "6+" } ]; const certificationPath = [ { level: "Open Water Diver", year: "2019", description: "Started my diving journey with basic certification", depth: "18m" }, { level: "Advanced Open Water", year: "2020", description: "Enhanced skills with deep and navigation dives", depth: "30m" }, { level: "Rescue Diver", year: "2021", description: "Learned emergency response and diver rescue techniques", depth: "30m" }, { level: "Divemaster", year: "2022", description: "Professional level certification - leading and assisting divers", depth: "40m" } ]; return (

Explore the locations where I've had incredible underwater adventures. Each pin represents a diving destination with unique marine life and experiences.

üåä Diving Philosophy

Ocean Conservation

Every dive is an opportunity to witness the beauty and fragility of marine ecosystems. I believe in responsible diving practices that protect and preserve underwater environments for future generations.

Continuous Learning

The ocean is an endless classroom. Each dive presents new challenges, marine life encounters, and opportunities to improve skills. I approach every underwater adventure with curiosity and respect.

Safety First

As a Divemaster and Emergency First Responder, safety is paramount. Proper planning, equipment maintenance, and adherence to diving protocols ensure enjoyable and safe underwater experiences.

"The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever." - Jacques Cousteau
); }; export default DivingPage;
